name: Peanut butter and Jelly: Into The Void
name_original: Peanut butter and Jelly: Into The Void
description:
Take some time out of your day to SPLATTER your friends against the walls with your Peanut butter balls then BODY SLAM them to make a lovely void sandwich online, in the void.

This is an online multiplayer game where you shoot other players into walls or objects to stun them. While they are stunned you can slam into them to make a sandwich and gain points.
